column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I also would have supported drilling off the coast .
#Text=For example , I 'm from Virginia .
#Text=The Virginia General Assembly has passed resolutions indicating its support of drilling off the coast of Virginia .
#Text=I would have allowed that instead of blocking it like President Obama .
#Text=I will also support the Keystone Pipeline , which he is opposing .
#Text=We need to have lower energy costs .
#Text=Lower energy costs would do most to enhance jobs , and most little small initiatives done by the president in other areas .
#Text=Would you have ordered the killing of Anwar al-Awlaki in Yemen ?
#Text=I do n’t know if the president ordered that .
#Text=Our national defense forces found him and he was fought in parcel with Osama bin Laden , and I think they did the right thing in taking out Osama bin Laden .
#Text=But was it right to take out Anwar al-Awlaki ?
#Text=Let ’s make sure we ’re taking about the same one .
#Text=Is that the guy in Yemen ?
#Text=Yes , the internet al-Qaeda leader .
#Text=I would want more intelligence than I have available to me right now .
#Text=Well he was an American citizen , so do you believe that we should treat American citizens overseas that are considered to be dangerous differently than others ?
#Text=Well let me ask you this : Did President Obama order his killing ?
#Text=I believe he did .
#Text=Well I want to know more facts before I say yes or no .
#Text=Did he do an act that effectively renounced his citizenship ?
#Text=He may have and may have committed treason .
#Text=So to answer that precisely , I would have to have more .
#Text=I would have to be privy to the intelligence briefings that president Obama had and that the members of the House and Senate intelligence committees had .
#Text=And I would like to also get the opinions of the members of the intelligence committee of the House and the Senate .
#Text=And I would want to ascertain whether he was truly a citizen of the United States .
#Text=Was he a dual-citizen ?
#Text=You do n’t know that do you ?
#Text=I do n’t know for sure .
#Text=Yeah , I do n’t either so I want to know more facts before I could say flat out one way or another .
#Text=Okay , let ’s talk more about foreign policy .
#Text=In 2002 , you voted to authorize the Iraq War and you supported the troop surge in 2007 .
#Text=However , the Constitution Party platform opposes undeclared wars , and supports a non-interventionist foreign policy .
#Text=Do you stand by your previous votes ?
#Text=Now if I was voting on that situation in 2008 , 2009 , 2010 , I would have said we should n’t go forward unless Congress debates the issue and declares war .
#Text=As president , how would you address the nuclear situation in Iran ?
